MOBILE.title: Mobile screens are not supported
MOBILE.text: Please use a larger screen that supports Metamask

TAKING-TO-LONG.text: If this is taking too long, please check your metamask or go to our

NO_WEB3_PROVIDER.title: Install MetaMask
NO_WEB3_PROVIDER.text: You will need a safe place to store your Quantum Dust: MetaMask. Metamask will also act as your login to the game (no extra password needed).

NOT_E11_POA.title: Switch to our network
NOT_E11_POA.text: You need to switch MetaMask to our own Ethereum network. To do this, open MetaMask and add our "Custom RPC"
NOT_E11_POA.guide: If you have any issues, check this short step-by-step guide.

LOCKED.title: Unlock MetaMask
LOCKED.text: It seems that your MetaMask is locked. Please enter your password and click "Unlock".
LOCKED.guide: If you have any issues, check this short step-by-step guide.

METAMASK_ERROR.title: Whoops!
METAMASK_ERROR.text: Something unexpected happened, please refresh this site and try again.
METAMASK_ERROR.guide: If the issue persists, please check our troubleshooting guide.

BATTLE.didnt-defeat: You couldn’t defeat an enemy village!

VILLAGE_QUEUE.empty-buildings-queue: Your buildings queue is empty. Start building!
VILLAGE_QUEUE.empty-barracks-queue: Your barracks queue is empty. Start building!

NEWUSER.disclaimer: Hey! This is an alpha release, please report any bugs!
NEWUSER.taking-long: If this is taking too long, please make sure there are no pending transactions on Metamask

PRIVATE_ACCESS.title: This is a private beta
PRIVATE_ACCESS.only-collaborators: This game is only available to Experimental collaborators.
PRIVATE_ACCESS.presale-info: If you'd like to join our pre-sale and become a collaborator, please click the button below.

BATTLE.portal-recharging: Portal recharging, wait {{ blocks }} blocks ({{ time }}) before attacking

portal_1.name: Small portal
portal_1.description: Travel to other realms and attack your opponents! Take the loot and come back home!

portal_2.name: Medium portal
portal_2.description: Travel to other realms and attack your opponents! Take the loot and come back home!

portal_3.name: Big portal
portal_3.description: Travel to other realms and attack your opponents! Take the loot and come back home!

tiny_warrior.name: Tiny warrior
tiny_warrior.description: The first unit you will unlock. He is as short as he is brave. His tiny legs will rush all over the realm, trying to destroy everything that steps in his way. He always moves with his pack.

archer.name: Archer
archer.description: Your archers are lonely creatures, one of your army’s most valuable resources - for ranged and really precise attacks. Have a few of these to ensure a great attack.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Slow but strong, clumsy but steady. Your guardians will never have enough, they can really take a punch! The perfect protector for your pack of tiny warriors.
